at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon

Class AdapterChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.ValueChangeProducer
      • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.Adapter
        • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.AdapterChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueChangeConsumer

    class AdapterChain
extends Adapter
    This is just a chain of adapters. An adapter chain has a method interface like a single adapter and returns the summary of the adoptions of all assigned adapters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdapterChain

        AdapterChain(BufferConfiguration config)
        Initializing with a given buffer configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - the buffer configuration

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        This method is called, whenever a shutdown sequence is initiated. The shutdown is delegated to all the adapters and then the adapters are deleted.
        Overrides:
        shutdown in class ValueChangeProducer

      • put

        void put(SimpleData value)
        Putting a value into the chain. It is routed to the first adapter.
        Parameters:
        value - the input value

      • valueChanged

        public void valueChanged(SimpleData newValue)
        This is the notification of a spontaneous value change of the last adapter in the chain. This value becomes the current value of the whole chain.
        Parameters:
        newValue - the new buffer value
